item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 18, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I modeled the Voynich Manuscript with SBERT to test for structure (221 points | 59 comments)
2. Spaced repetition systems have gotten better (571 points | 380 comments)
3. Ditching Obsidian and building my own (148 points | 181 comments)
4. Show HN: Vaev – A browser engine built from scratch (It renders google.com) (62 points | 17 comments)
5. Show HN: Python Simulator of David Deutsch’s "Constructor Theory of Time" (16 points | 2 comments)
6. $30 Homebrew Automated Blinds Opener (110 points | 42 comments)
7. Spaced Repetition Memory System (104 points | 9 comments)
8. K-Scale Labs: Open-source humanoid robots, built for developers (16 points | 5 comments)
9. The Fall of Roam (52 points | 11 comments)
10. Show HN: Buckaroo – Data table UI for Notebooks (59 points | 5 comments)
11. Comparing Parallel Functional Array Languages: Programming and Performance (14 points | discuss)
12. Hyper Typing (4 points | 15 comments)
13. Emergent social conventions and collective bias in LLM populations (33 points | 6 comments)
14. Yahtzeeql – Yahtzee solver that's mostly SQL (4 points | 1 comment)
15. Show HN: Hardtime.nvim – break bad habits and master Vim motions (138 points | 54 comments)
16. Show HN: Stack Error – ergonomic error handling for Rust (12 points | 3 comments)
17. How the humble chestnut traced the rise and fall of the Roman Empire (27 points | 1 comment)
18. In Memoriam: John L. Young, Cryptome Co-Founder (138 points | 13 comments)
19. Building my childhood dream PC (100 points | 42 comments)
20. Show HN: Model2vec-Rs – Fast Static Text Embeddings in Rust (44 points | 4 comments)
21. Dezyne Programming Language (11 points | discuss)
22. Mystical (341 points | 41 comments)
23. Show HN: Racketmeter – Measure Badminton String Tension Using Sound Frequency (25 points | 6 comments)
24. AniSora: Open-source anime video generation model (312 points | 172 comments)
25. Show HN: A web browser agent in your Chrome side panel (116 points | 50 comments)
26. Magic Leap One Bootloader Exploit (55 points | 3 comments)
27. O(n) vs. O(n^2) Startups (64 points | 63 comments)
28. Show HN: Chat with 19 years of HN (108 points | 75 comments)
29. Project Verona: Fearless Concurrency for Python (147 points | 111 comments)
30. Working with Git Patches in Apple Mail (2023) (39 points | 18 comments)
